text: You should just need to set up a webhook trigger on Zapier, then send a sample form fill/request to the webhook endpoint. From there you should be able to figure out what the HS naming convention is for those dropdown values, and use their GUI to set up the mapping of HS value keys to Vtiger value keys.
Hi! Is it possible to display images on the HS site search result listing?
had to collapse this gif, started freaking me out lol
I believe the featured image was part of the info you can pull back. Might not be shown by default but if you go in to edit the module you may be able to add it.
Yea if you have featured images or `og;image` tags on your page you should be able to pull back their URLs from the search results JSON

Is there a way to add sizes to RSS blog email template? I’ve created an email template but the third image is always smaller. I’ve resized, changed and tried adding a size using the resize_image_url code but nothing will fix this.
is this a drag and drop email?
No its a template somebody else created I’ve added the RSS feed using the option in the wysiwyg. I’ve had to add some custom styling in the template to fix this.
does content based off of `request.cookies` break caching?
Does anybody have any experience with the newer Eventbrite in-page modal pop-up, and if so, did you happen to run into the issue of it popping a new tab along with the modal window?
